sense.gloss: to put on weight, to gain weight, to grow fat, to get stout

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べ↑過↑↓す↓ぎると|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|。
sdata.e: If you eat too much, you'll become fat.

sdata.j: もっと↑運動↑↓うんどう↓をしないと|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|よ。
sdata.e: If you don't get more exercise, you'll get fat.

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べ↑過↑↓す↓ぎると|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|。
sdata.e: You will get fat if you eat too much.

sdata.j: そんなに↑食↑↓た↓べると|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|よ。
sdata.e: You'll fatten up if you eat that much.

sdata.j: そんなに↑食↑↓た↓べると|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|よ。
sdata.e: If you eat that much, you'll get fat.

sdata.j: こんな↑時間↑↓じかん↓に↑食↑↓た↓べたら|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|ぞ。
sdata.e: If you eat at this time of night, you'll get fat.

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べすぎると|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|よ。
sdata.e: If you eat too much, you'll become fat.

sdata.j: ↑夜中↑↓よなか↓にポテチなんか↑食↑↓た↓べたら、|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|よ。
sdata.e: If you eat stuff like potato chips in the middle of the night, you'll get fat.

sdata.j: パンを↑食↑↓た↓べると|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|って、↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓？
sdata.e: Is it true that eating bread will make you fat?

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べ↑過↑↓す↓ぎると|↑太↑↓ふと↓る|。
sdata.e: If you eat too much, you will get fat.
